title: Robert Downey Jr launches venture funds to invest in sustainable technologies
lead: They are part of Footprint Coalition, a project announced by the Iron Man and Avengers star in 2019, which also includes a non-profit arm that supports early scientific research

title: HS2 tunnel protestors vow to continue occupation
lead: Protesters staying in the tunnel spoke to ELN about their intentions

title: Scottish Budget announces £1.9bn of investment in green recovery
lead: The investment includes the delivery of a £1.6 billion heat and energy efficiency upgrade programme

title: EDF and British Gas Evolve appointed to take on failed suppliers’ customers
lead: Customers of Green Network Energy and Simplicity Energy will be contacted about the switch over the coming days

title: CCC urges government to reconsider permission for Cumbrian coal mine
lead: Lord Deben warns the site could increase global emissions and undermine the UK’s leadership of COP26

title: Court rules Shell must pay farmers over oil spills
lead: Shell Nigeria is liable for damages from pipeline leaks in the villages of Oruma and Goi, the Hague Court of Appeals said in a ruling

title: British Gas engineers to go on strike again for four days
lead: GMB Union members will walk out on 5th, 6th, 7th and 8th February

title: Equinor and bp form US offshore wind partnership
lead: It comes as the two companies completed their previously announced deal, whereby Equinor sold a 50% interest in both the Empire Wind and Beacon Wind assets on the US east coast

title: Natalie Prosser appointed as Interim CEO for Office for Environmental Protection
lead: She will start her role, which is limited until December, in February, alongside Chair-designate Dame Glenys Stacey

title: Korean energy giant plugs $2.2bn into Hungarian battery plant
lead: The 30GWh factory will cater for expected demand for batteries in Europe
